snippet.title: Chantelise - A Tale of Two Sisters Trailer
snippet.description:
Five years ago, a witch's curse beneath the red moon turned Chante into a fairy. Now she and her sister Elise search for a way to transform her back into a human, and in their travels they come across a particular town, which is home to a number of nearby ruins, as well as a peculiar shopkeeper named Aira, and a strange, mercurial...

Chantelise - A Tale of Two Sisters is an action role-playing game developed by EasyGameStation for Windows. It was originally released in Japan in 2006 and an English version was released on Steam and GamersGate on July 29, 2011. 

Get the free demo on steam
http://store.steampowered.com/app/70420/
